title: Lag since the update 2 or 3 days ago
body: Not the actual rollout of the arcade skins and the nerfs/buffs of 6.17, but a couple days before it there was a small update for something and since then I have been getting random ping spikes for anywhere from 5seconds to a minute, have had trouble connecting to a few games and the store has been slow, its only League that has been responding this way I have no issues while downloading, or streaming or playing any other games to include OW, Strife, WoW,  and a number of other online games, I am connected directly to my router, have no other devices and even turned off all voice comms and music streaming while playing it still randomly spikes I have run ping tests during the spikes and my ping was fine from my connection it just seems to be a confliction with League has anyone else experienced this issue, I have been playing for 2 years on this connection with no issues and contacted my ISP and had them try to resolve it and have they couldn't find any problems.

replies.body: It sounds like your network is having trouble connecting to our servers specifically, even if other apps might be running okay for.  As a first step, I suggest going over the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this fixed up.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to perform some steps automatically, like configuring your firewall settings.  That should help get things fixed up!
